title: RP NEEDED
body: Hello Riot, I just recently got brand, and I have a skin shard for him. I just need 400 Orange Essence and I would really appreciate it if you gave me just enough RP to get the 5 chest and keys + 10 Orange Essence bundle, if you give me this I will NEVER ask for anything again. Thank You.

replies.body:
We do trade art for RP when players need a little extra. That said, I took a look at your account and it doesn't look like you have any RP right now. I can still make a trade for a small 'stimpack' of RP, however it won't be enough for you to get the Bundle you want. :(

If you still want to make the trade for as much as I can give, then hit me up with a sketch of a Poro signed with your Summoner Name and I'll send it your way. But you'll need to acquire more RP on your own to buy the Bundle.
Would the stimpack of Rp be enough to get at least katarina?
